text:
Each time I switch branch (even not changing any file) it takes me 1hour to rebuild the docs.
I don't know if this is an expected behaviour.
title: building docs takes so long

text: This is a known behavior. The problem is that the cache is invalidated for no reason. PR welcome.

> This is a known behavior. The problem is that the cache is invalidated for no
> reason. PR welcome.

No need to do a PR: the new version of sphinx-gallery will solve this.
We'll need to backport it nilearn as soon as it is released.

> No need to do a PR: the new version of sphinx-gallery will solve this. We'll need to backport it nilearn as soon as it is released.

I didn't know! Great work!

> I didn't know! Great work!

Yup, we need to thank @Titan-C
